snippet: The companion of Jacqil Degraffenreid’s mother was arrested after the 23-month-old was found unconscious and unresponsive.
abstract: Death of 23-month-old Jacqil Degraffenreid of Brooklyn is ruled a homicide; Tyree Wright, companion of the boy's mother, is arrested and charged in the case.
lead_paragraph: The companion of Jacqil Degraffenreid’s mother was arrested after the 23-month-old was found unconscious and unresponsive.

headline.seo: Death of Brooklyn Boy Is Ruled a Homicide
headline.main: Boy’s Death a Homicide; Man Charged
headline.print_headline: Boy’s Death A Homicide; Man Charged
